Either you accept or not accept our quotation, what price I shall pay?" I said, "Give me six dollars." Immediately he took this book. "Such a nice book I have never read. So either it is printed or not printed in our press, I must take this book." Actually, these ideas what we have explained in our books, they're unknown to the modern world. Unknown.

Question Text: They're not described anywhere else. No other source.
Answer Text: Nobody knows that God can be person, there can be dealings like this, there are dealings actually, and they are described. That is wonderful.

Question Text: They don't know that life can be so joyful and endlessly...
Answer Text: That I wrote in my poetry. "The Absolute is sentient thou hast proved." That was striking to me. Not impersonal, "sentient thou hast proved, impersonal calamity thou hast moved." "Absolute is sentient thou hast proved." That was my acceptance. So even the many judges came in Allahabad, do you remember?

Question Text: Yes. In Madras?
Answer Text: No, Allahabad during Kumbha - melā . They said, "Swamiji, God is person, you are the first man speaking." Why first man? It is already there. They cannot believe that God is person.

Question Text: As long as there is imperson, there is doubt, there is unclear, unclear.
Answer Text: Unclear.

Question Text: As soon as there is person, there is no doubt, clear.
Answer Text: But we have tried to explain how He is person. Just like we try to explain how God is working. So one should have brain to study things. One must have clear idea how God is person, how He is working, how this cosmic manifestation is manifested by God's energy. Kṛṣṇa says, mayā tatam idaṁ sarvaṁ jagad avyakta - mūrtinā [Bg. 9.4 ] . "In My impersonal feature, everything is manifested there." Tatam idaṁ sarvam . Īśāvāsyam idaṁ sarvam [Īśo mantra 1] . So one has to apply his brain—that is intelligence—how it has become person. That is not false, that is fact. You cannot understand; your brain is teeny. That is different thing. Now you make your brain competent to understand this philosophy. (break) ... vijñātaṁ bhavanti . So take this philosophy nicely, understand this philosophy, and preach. You will be victorious everywhere, because we can challenge anyone. If you know the trick, Kṛṣṇa consciousness, you can challenge. Nārāyaṇa - parāḥ sarve na kutaścana bibhyati [SB 6.17.28 ] . One who is nārāyaṇa - parāḥ , he is never afraid of anything.

Answer Text: This is Kṛṣṇa's mercy. If somebody is thinking, "If I had like this, like that, like that, like that." "All right you will have all." That is the only problem. Sarva - dharmān parityajya mām ekam [Bg. 18.66 ] , if you want this. Otherwise, you take whatever you like.
